Option.Name: HostPlatformOnly
Option.Description: A helper option to make an installed build for your host platform only, so that you don't have to disable each platform individually

Option.Name: HostPlatformEditorOnly
Option.Description: A helper option to make an installed build for your host platform only, so that you don't have to disable each platform individually

Option.Name: AllPlatforms
Option.Description: Include all target platforms by default

Option.Name: CompileDatasmithPlugins
Option.Description: If Datasmith plugins should be compiled on a separate node.

Option.Name: WithWin64
Option.Description: Include the Win64 target platform

Option.Name: WithMac
Option.Description: Include the Mac target platform

Option.Name: WithMacArm64
Option.Description: Include the Arm64 architecture version of the Mac target platform

Option.Name: WithAndroid
Option.Description: Include the Android target platform

Option.Name: WithIOS
Option.Description: Include the iOS target platform

Option.Name: WithTVOS
Option.Description: Include the tvOS target platform

Option.Name: WithLinux
Option.Description: Include the Linux target platform

Option.Name: WithLinuxArm64
Option.Description: Include the Linux AArch64 target platform

Option.Name: WithClient
Option.Description: Include precompiled client targets

Option.Name: WithServer
Option.Description: Include precompiled server targets

Option.Name: WithDDC
Option.Description: Build a standalone derived-data cache for the engine content and templates

Option.Name: HostPlatformDDCOnly
Option.Description: Whether to include DDC for the host platform only

Option.Name: SignExecutables
Option.Description: Sign the executables produced where signing is available

Option.Name: AnalyticsTypeOverride
Option.Description: Identifier for analytic events to send

Option.Name: EmbedSrcSrvInfo
Option.Description: Whether to add Source indexing to Windows game apps so they can be added to a symbol server

Option.Name: GameConfigurations
Option.Description: Which game configurations to include for packaged applications

Option.Name: WithFullDebugInfo
Option.Description: Generate full debug info for binary editor and packaged application builds

Option.Name: BuiltDirectory
Option.Description: Directory for outputting the built engine

Option.Name: AllowParallelExecutor
Option.Description: Allow the use of UAT's ParallelExecutor when compiling

Option.Name: CrashReporterAPIURL
Option.Description: The URL to use to talk to the CrashReporterClient API.

Option.Name: CrashReporterAPIKey
Option.Description: The API key to use to talk to the CrashReporterClient API.

Node.Name: Compile UnrealEditor Win64
Node.Produces: #UnrealEditor Win64;#UnrealEditor Win64 Unstripped;#UnrealEditor Win64 Stripped;#UnrealEditor Win64 Unsigned;#UnrealEditor Win64 Signed;#UnrealEditor Win64 WithExceptions

Log.Message: Embedding source file information into PDB files...

Node.Name: Compile UnrealEditor Mac
Node.Produces: #UnrealEditor Mac;#UnrealEditor Mac Unstripped;#UnrealEditor Mac Stripped;#UnrealEditor Mac Unsigned;#UnrealEditor Mac Signed;#UnrealEditor Mac WithExceptions

Node.Name: Compile UnrealEditor Linux
Node.Produces: #UnrealEditor Linux;#UnrealEditor Linux Unstripped;#UnrealEditor Linux Stripped;#UnrealEditor Linux WithExceptions

Node.Name: Compile UnrealGame Win64
Node.Produces: #UnrealGame Win64;#UnrealGame Win64 Unstripped;#UnrealGame Win64 Stripped;#UnrealGame Win64 Unsigned;#UnrealGame Win64 Signed

Log.Message: Embedding source file information into PDB files...

Node.Name: Compile UnrealGame LinuxArm64 LinuxNative
Node.Produces: #UnrealGame LinuxArm64 LinuxNative;#UnrealGame LinuxArm64 LinuxNative Unstripped;#UnrealGame LinuxArm64 LinuxNative Stripped

Node.Name: Compile UnrealGame Mac
Node.Produces: #UnrealGame Mac;#UnrealGame Mac Unstripped;#UnrealGame Mac Stripped;#UnrealGame Mac Unsigned;#UnrealGame Mac Signed

Node.Name: Build Tools Win64
Node.Requires: Compile UnrealHeaderTool Win64;#NotForLicensee Build Tools Win64

Log.Message: Embedding source file information into PDB files...

#Build Tools CS Binaries Mac;#Sign Binaries Mac
